name: MortyAPI.Commands

aliases.name: ApproachParameters
aliases.comment: Parameters required to POST a new Task Approach
aliases.type: { mortyApiToken : String , mortyHost : String , msgType : RemoteData.WebData MortyAPI.Types.Approach -> a }

aliases.name: CurrentUserParameters
aliases.comment: Parameters required to retrieve the current user
aliases.type: { mortyApiToken : String , mortyHost : String , msgType : RemoteData.WebData MortyAPI.Types.User -> a }

aliases.name: KanbanLanesForTeamParameters
aliases.comment: Parameters required to retrieve the kanban board for a full team
aliases.type: { mortyApiToken : String , mortyHost : String , teamId : Int , msgType : RemoteData.WebData MortyAPI.Types.KanbanLanesSuccessResponse -> a }

aliases.name: KanbanLanesForUserParameters
aliases.comment: Parameters required to retrieve the kanban board for a single user
aliases.type: { mortyApiToken : String , mortyHost : String , userId : Int , msgType : RemoteData.WebData MortyAPI.Types.KanbanLanesSuccessResponse -> a }

aliases.name: TaskParameters
aliases.comment: Parameters required to retrieve a task
aliases.type: { mortyApiToken : String , mortyHost : String , taskId : Int , msgType : RemoteData.WebData MortyAPI.Types.Task -> a }

aliases.name: TasksParameters
aliases.comment: Parameters required to retrieve task matching owner and scope
aliases.type: { mortyApiToken : String , mortyHost : String , ownerType : Maybe.Maybe String , ownerId : Maybe.Maybe Int , taskScope : Maybe.Maybe String , taskScopeParam : Maybe.Maybe String , msgType : RemoteData.WebData (List MortyAPI.Types.Task) -> a }

aliases.name: TeamsParameters
aliases.comment: Parameters required to retrieve a list of teams
aliases.type: { mortyApiToken : String , mortyHost : String , msgType : RemoteData.WebData MortyAPI.Types.TeamsSuccessResponse -> a }

values.name: getCurrentUserCommand
values.comment: Gets the current user from the API

values.name: getKanbanLanesForTeam
values.comment: Retrieves all kanban lanes for a team

values.name: getKanbanLanesForUser
values.comment: Retrieves all kanban lanes for a user

values.name: getTaskCommand
values.comment: Gets a task from the API

values.name: getTasksCommand
values.comment: Gets a list of tasks matching the filter criteria from the API

values.name: getTeams
values.comment: Retrieves all teams and their members

values.name: postTaskApproachCommand
values.comment: POSTs a new task approach to the API

values.name: putTaskUpdateCommand
values.comment: Updates the properties of a task using a PUT call to the API

name: MortyAPI.Decoders

values.name: decodeApproach
values.comment: Provides a decoder for JSON -> MortyAPI.Types.Approach

values.name: decodeKanbanLanesSuccessResponse
values.comment: Provides a decoder for JSON -> MortyAPI.Types.KanbanLanesSuccessResponse

values.name: decodeTask
values.comment: Provides a decoder for JSON -> MortyAPI.Types.Task

values.name: decodeTeamsSuccessResponse
values.comment: Provides a decoder for JSON -> MortyAPI.Types.TeamsSuccessResponse

values.name: decodeUser
values.comment: Provides a decoder for JSON -> MortyAPI.Types.User

name: MortyAPI.Encoders

values.name: encodeApproach
values.comment: Encode MortyAPI.Types.Approach into JSON.

values.name: encodeTask
values.comment: Encode MortyAPI.Types.Task into JSON.

values.name: fifthTask
values.comment: A dummy feature task

values.comment: A dummy feature task

values.name: firstUser
values.comment: A dummy user

values.comment: A dummy feature task

values.name: kanbanLanesSuccessResponse
values.comment: A dummy full Kanban lanes response from the API

values.name: secondTask
values.comment: A dummy chore task

values.name: secondUser
values.comment: A dummy user

values.name: sixthTask
values.comment: A dummy feature task

values.name: teamsSuccessResponse
values.comment: A dummy full Teams response from the API

values.name: thirdTask
values.comment: A dummy feature task

name: MortyAPI.Utilities

values.name: allKanbanLanesProblems
values.comment: Returns a list of problem message strings from the entire board.

values.name: kanbanLaneStageList
values.comment: Returns a list of stages from a lane

name: MortyAPI.Types

aliases.name: Approach
aliases.comment:
The Approach to a task. Used to create a new approach or return
a list of existing approaches when you retrieve a task.
aliases.type: { id : Int , taskId : Int , user : MortyAPI.Types.User , description : String , myHours : Maybe.Maybe Float , seniorHours : Maybe.Maybe Float , midLevelHours : Maybe.Maybe Float , juniorHours : Maybe.Maybe Float }

aliases.name: KanbanLane
aliases.comment:
A Kanban lane - effectively the lane representing a single user.
Returned as part of the `KanbanLanes` record.
aliases.type: { acceptedStage : MortyAPI.Types.KanbanStage , deliveredStage : MortyAPI.Types.KanbanStage , inProgressStage : MortyAPI.Types.KanbanStage , metaStage : MortyAPI.Types.KanbanStage , toDoStage : MortyAPI.Types.KanbanStage , toEstimateStage : MortyAPI.Types.KanbanStage , user : MortyAPI.Types.KanbanUser }

aliases.name: KanbanLanes
aliases.comment: The whole Kanban board.
aliases.type: { label : String, kanbanLanes : List MortyAPI.Types.KanbanLane }

aliases.name: KanbanLanesData
aliases.comment: The "data" content of the JSON API compliant response.
aliases.type: { attributes : MortyAPI.Types.KanbanLanes , id : String , dataType : String }

aliases.name: KanbanLanesSuccessResponse
aliases.comment: The full JSON compliant response.
aliases.type: { data : MortyAPI.Types.KanbanLanesData }

aliases.name: KanbanStage
aliases.comment:
A stage in the Kanban board - meta, to estimate, to do, in progress, delivered and accepted are
all instances of this.
aliases.type: { status : MortyAPI.Types.KanbanStageStatus , tasks : List MortyAPI.Types.KanbanTask }

aliases.name: KanbanStageStatusFields
aliases.comment: The raw fields from the API, just for decoding purposes.
aliases.type: { status : String, message : Maybe.Maybe String }

aliases.name: KanbanTask
aliases.comment: A task with only the properties required to render the Kanban board.
aliases.type: { daysSinceLastChanged : Int , description : String , estimate : Maybe.Maybe Int , mortyUrl : String , pivotalUrl : String , priority : MortyAPI.Types.KanbanTaskPriority , requestedBy : Maybe.Maybe String , taskType : MortyAPI.Types.KanbanTaskType }

aliases.name: KanbanUser
aliases.comment: A Kanban board user, represented by a lane.
aliases.type: { email : String, fullName : String }

aliases.name: Task
aliases.comment:
The record type returned by asking Morty for a Task via `MortyAPI.Commands.getTasksCommand` or
`MortyAPI.Commands.getTaskCommand`.
aliases.type: { id : Int , title : String , description : String , taskType : String , externalIdentifier : String , status : String , secondsSinceStatusChanged : Int , ownedBy : Maybe.Maybe MortyAPI.Types.User , requestedBy : Maybe.Maybe String , taskApproaches : List MortyAPI.Types.Approach , predictionGroupId : Maybe.Maybe Int , predictionJudgementAt : Maybe.Maybe String , midLevelHourEstimate : Maybe.Maybe Int }

aliases.name: Team
aliases.comment: The record type returned by asking Morty for Teams via `MortyAPI.Commands.getTeamsCommand`
aliases.type: { id : Int , identifier : Maybe.Maybe String , name : String , members : List MortyAPI.Types.TeamMember }

aliases.name: TeamMember
aliases.comment:
The record type returned by asking Morty for Teams via `MortyAPI.Commands.getTeamsCommand` and
representing the team members in the team
aliases.type: { id : Int, fullName : String, email : String, seniority : String }

aliases.name: TeamsData
aliases.comment: The "data" content of the JSON API compliant response.
aliases.type: { attributes : List MortyAPI.Types.Team }

aliases.name: TeamsSuccessResponse
aliases.comment: The full JSON compliant response.
aliases.type: { data : MortyAPI.Types.TeamsData }

aliases.name: User
aliases.comment:
The record type returned by asking Morty for the current user via
`MortyAPI.Commands.getUserCommand`. It is also how the user is represented in the `Task` record.
aliases.type: { id : Int , fullName : String , email : String , seniority : String , predictionBookApiToken : Maybe.Maybe String }

types.name: KanbanStageStatus
types.comment: The possible statuses a `KanbanStage` can have.

types.name: KanbanTaskPriority
types.comment: The different task priorities with unique display properties

types.name: KanbanTaskType
types.comment: The different types a kanban task can be.
